name: YumeCore
description: "YumeCore" is a new type of game combining side-scrolling beat-’em-up action with adventure-style investigation that puts the “aii” in “kawaii.” Fight your way through the waking dreams of the sickly girl Soboko to escape the hospital.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)i7-5000U CPU @ 2.40GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1920x1080 Storage: 100 MB available space
